title: Jonas Ring and the Shadow Lands
description: Thirteen-year-old minor league geek Jonas Ring longs to be normal. Smaller and weaker than boys his age, he prays to someday be big and strong enough to join the football team.But when he develops magical powers, finds out his family thinks he’s some kind of mystical boogieman, and is called to defend the final resting place of all witch kind—The Shadow Lands—he must master his burgeoning powers and overcome his greatest fear.But will he succeed when he has to battle wolf-like wraiths, the Lican, that kill and devour everything in their path.Contact me at broke33poke@gmail.com and tell me how you like the book, or just to say hello.
author: Michael Cain
